TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataContext extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 表示 LINQ to SQL 框架的主入口点。

span.span: Represents the main entry point for the LINQ to SQL framework.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是通过数据库连接映射的所有实体的源。The is the source of all entities mapped over a database connection. 它跟踪您对所有检索到的实体所做的更改，并维护一个 "标识缓存"，保证使用同一个对象实例来表示检索到多个实体。It tracks changes that you made to all retrieved entities and maintains an "identity cache" that guarantees that entities retrieved more than one time are represented by using the same object instance. 通常情况下， 实例设计为最后一个 "工作单元"，但您的应用程序定义了该术语。In general, a instance is designed to last for one "unit of work" however your application defines that term. 是轻量的，创建的成本并不高。A is lightweight and is not expensive to create. 典型的 [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] 应用程序 在方法范围创建实例，或在表示一组相关数据库操作逻辑集的生存期类的成员中创建实例。A typical [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] application creates instances at method scope or as a member of short-lived classes that represent a logical set of related database operations.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 你所使用的连接字符串可为 ADO.NET 连接字符串。

span.span: The connection string you use can be an ADO.NET connection string.

summary.span: 你还可以指定 SQL Server Express 或 SQL Server Compact 文件的文件名。

span.span: You can also specify a filename to a SQL Server Express or SQL Server Compact file.

summary.span: 通过引用由 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 使用的连接来初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by referencing the connection used by the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果提供关闭的连接或连接字符串，则会根据需要打开并关闭数据库连接。A opens and closes a database connection as needed if you provide a closed connection or a connection string. 通常，你不必 `Dispose` 在上调用 。In general, you should never have to call `Dispose` on a . 如果提供打开的连接，则 不会将其关闭。If you provide an open connection, the will not close it. 因此，不要 使用打开的连接来实例化，除非您有充分的理由来这样做。Therefore, do not instantiate a with an open connection unless you have a good reason to do this. 在 事务中， 将不会打开或关闭连接以避免升级。In a transaction, a will not open or close a connection to avoid promotion.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值增大查询的超时期限（以秒为单位），如果不增大则会在默认超时期限间出现超时。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that increases the time-out period (in seconds) for queries that would otherwise time out during the default time-out period.

value.span: 一个整数值，该值增加了在默认超时期限内将会超时的查询的超时时间段（以秒为单位） () 。

span.span: An integer value that increases the time-out period (in seconds) for queries that would otherwise time out during the default time-out period.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性获取或设置命令超时 (（秒）) 用于执行 () 生成的命令 `IDbCommands` 。This property gets or sets the command time-out (in seconds) used to execute generated commands (`IDbCommands`). 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . 如果未设置此属性，则的默认值 将用于执行查询命令。When this property is not set, the default value of is used for query command execution. 此默认值是由存储提供程序设置的。This default value is set by the storage provider. 请注意，如果此值设置为非零值，则某些提供程序可能会引发异常。Note that some providers may throw exceptions if this value is set to a non-zero value.

summary.span: 在服务器上创建数据库。

span.span: Creates a database on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该数据库的名称是使用以下算法派生的：The name of the database is derived by using the following algorithm: 1. 如果在连接字符串中标识数据库，则使用其名称。If a database is identified in the connection string, its name is used. 1. 如果 存在属性，则该属性 将用作数据库的名称。If a attribute is present, its property is used as the name of the database. 1. 如果连接字符串中没有数据库标记，并且使用强类型，则将 创建一个与继承类同名的数据库 。If there is no database tag in the connection string and a strongly typed is used, a database that has the same name as the inheriting class is created. 1. 如果使用弱类型 ，则会引发异常。If a weakly typed is used, an exception is thrown. 1. 如果已 使用文件名创建了，则将创建与该文件名称对应的数据库。If the has been created by using a file name, the database corresponding to that file name is created. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何设置临时数据库，然后将其删除。The following code shows how to set up a temporary database and then remove it. [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.DataContext#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.DataContext/cs/Program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.DataContext#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.DataContext/vb/Module1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示延迟加载是一对多还是一对一的关系。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to delay-load one-to-many or one-to-one relationships.

value.span: 如果启用延迟加载，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if deferred loading is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当代码访问其中一个关系时，如果关系为一对一，则返回 null，如果为一对多，则返回空集合。When the code accesses one of these relationships, null is returned if the relationship is one-to-one, and an empty collection is returned if it is one-to-many. 还可以通过设置属性来填充关系 。The relationships can still be filled by setting the property. 此属性的主要方案是使你能够提取对象模型的一部分并将其发送 (例如，发送到 Web 服务) 。The main scenario for this property is to enable you to extract a piece of the object model and send it out (for example, to a Web service). > [!NOTE] > 如果在执行查询后将此属性设置为 `false` ，则会引发异常。If this property is set to `false` after a query has been executed, an exception is thrown. 有关详细信息，请参阅下面的 **有效模式** 部分。See the **Valid Modes** section below for more information. ## 有效模式Valid modes 延迟加载需要对象跟踪。Deferred loading requires object tracking. 只有以下三种模式有效：Only the following three modes are valid: - = `false`. = `false`. 被忽略并推断为 `false` 。 is ignored and inferred to be `false`. 此行为对应于一个只读 。This behavior corresponds to a read-only . - = `true`. = `true`. = `false`. = `false`. 此情况对应于 使用户能够通过使用指令加载对象图的， 但它不启用延迟加载。This situation corresponds to a that allows users to load an object graph by using directives, but it does not enable deferred loading. - 两者均设置为 `true` 。Both are set to `true`. 这是默认设置。This is the default. 执行查询后，不能更改标志。The flags may not be changed after a query has been executed. 在执行使用的第一个查询后发生的任何更改都会 引发异常。Any change after the execution of the first query that uses that throws an exception.

summary.span: 直接对数据库执行 SQL 命令。

span.span: Executes SQL commands directly on the database.

returns.span: 执行的命令修改的行数。

span.span: The number of rows modified by the executed command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是一种传递机制，适用于对于 [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] 特定方案没有充分提供的情况。This method is a pass-through mechanism for cases where [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] does not adequately provide for a particular scenario. 命令的语法与用于创建 ADO.NET 的语法几乎相同 `DataCommand` 。The syntax for the command is almost the same as the syntax used to create an ADO.NET `DataCommand`. 唯一的区别在于如何指定参数。The only difference is in how the parameters are specified. 具体而言，通过将参数括在大括号中来指定参数 ( {...}) 并从0开始枚举。Specifically, you specify parameters by enclosing them in braces ({…}) and enumerate them starting from 0. 参数与参数数组中的编号相同的对象相关联。The parameter is associated with the equally numbered object in the parameters array. `ExecuteQuery` 和 `ExecuteCommand` 允许您为参数替换指定可变数量的参数。`ExecuteQuery` and `ExecuteCommand` allow you to specify a variable number of arguments for parameter substitution. 例如，可以在调用 ExecuteQuery 时指定参数 \ ：For example, you can specify the parameters when invoking ExecuteQuery\: ```csharp db.ExecuteQuery("SELECT * FROM dbo.Customers WHERE City = {0}", "London"); ``` ```vb db.ExecuteQuery(Of Customer)("SELECT * FROM dbo.Customers WHERE City = {0}", "London") ``` 另一个示例：And, another example: ```csharp db.ExecuteCommand("UPDATE Products SET QuantityPerUnit = {0} WHERE ProductID = {1}", "24 boxes", 5); ``` ```vb db.ExecuteCommand("UPDATE Products SET QuantityPerUnit = {0} WHERE ProductID = {1}", "24 boxes", 5) ``` ## Examples 下面的示例打开一个连接，并将 SQL `UPDATE` 命令传递给 sql 引擎。The following example opens a connection and passes a SQL `UPDATE` command to the SQL engine. [!code-csharp[DLinqCommunicatingWithDatabase#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DLinqCommunicatingWithDatabase/cs/Program.cs#3)] [!code-vb[DLinqCommunicatingWithDatabase#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DLinqCommunicatingWithDatabase/vb/Module1.vb#3)]

summary.span: 在插入重写方法中执行，以向 [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] 重新委托生成和执行插入操作的动态 SQL 的任务。

span.span: Executes, inside insert override methods, to redelegate to [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] the task of generating and executing dynamic SQL for insert operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意以下事项：Note the following considerations: - 由于该方法具有受保护的修饰符，因此它的使用需要子类化 。Because the method has a protected modifier, its use requires subclassing . - 如果未在操作内调用此操作，则会引发异常 。An exception is thrown if this operation is not called inside a operation. 不应将其作为独立操作在操作范围之外调用 。It is not intended to be called as a stand-alone operation outside the scope of a operation. 本身调用重写方法，前提是它们已实现并且之前的方法旨在在重写方法中调用。 itself calls override methods if they are implemented and the previous methods are intended to be called inside the override methods. - 开发人员负责传入正确的实体。It is the responsibility of the developer to pass in the correct entity. 实现将验证是否跟踪了传入的实体。The implementation verifies that the passed-in entity is tracked. 但是，开发人员负责维护订单或在同一实体中传递两次。However, it is the responsibility of the developer to maintain the order or pass in the same entity two times. - 开发人员负责调用正确的动态 API。It is the responsibility of the developer to invoke the correct dynamic API. 例如，在 `Update` 重写方法中，只能 调用方法。For example, in the `Update` override method, only the method can be called. [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] 不检测或验证调用的动态方法是否与适用的操作相匹配。does not detect or verify whether the invoked dynamic method matches the applicable operation. 如果调用不适用方法，则结果是不确定的 (例如，调用 要更新的对象) 。The results are undefined if an inapplicable method is called (for example, calling for an object to be updated).

summary.span: 直接对数据库执行 SQL 查询并返回对象。

span.span: Executes SQL queries directly on the database and returns objects.

returns.span: 由查询返回的对象的集合。

span.span: A collection of objects returned by the query.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是一种传递机制，适用于 [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] 不提供特定方案的情况。This method is a pass-through mechanism for cases where [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] does not provide for a particular scenario. 将查询结果中的列与对象中的字段和属性相匹配的算法如下所示：The algorithm for matching columns in the result of the query to fields and properties in the object works as follows: - 如果字段或属性映射到特定列名称，则结果集中应包含该列名称。If a field or property is mapped to a particular column name, that column name is expected in the resultset. - 如果未映射字段或属性，则结果集中应包含其名称与该字段或属性相同的列。If a field or property is not mapped, a column with the same name as the field or property is expected in the resultset. - 通过首先查找区分大小写的匹配来执行比较。The comparison is performed by first looking for a case-sensitive match. 如果找不到这样的匹配项，则会出现不区分大小写的匹配项的后续搜索。If such a match is not found, a subsequent search occurs for a case-insensitive match. - 当满足以下所有条件时，该查询必须返回对象的所有跟踪的字段和属性， (这些字段和属性与要推迟加载) 相关：The query must return all the tracked fields and properties of the object (apart from those subject to deferred loading) when all the following are true: - 如果 `` 是由显式跟踪的实体 。If `` is an entity explicitly tracked by the . - ObjectTrackingEnabled 为 true。ObjectTrackingEnabled is true. - 实体具有主键。The entity has a primary key. 否则会引发异常。Otherwise an exception is thrown. - 在所有其他情况下，查询可以只检索对象的跟踪字段和属性的子集。In all other cases, the query can retrieve just a subset of the tracked fields and properties for the object. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了此方法的一种用法：The following example shows one use for this method: ```csharp var customers = db.ExecuteQuery(@"SELECT CustomerID, CompanyName, ContactName, ContactTitle, Address, City, Region, PostalCode, Country, Phone, Fax FROM   dbo.Customers WHERE  City = {0}", "London"); foreach (Customer c in customers) Console.WriteLine(c.ContactName); ``` ```vb Dim customers = db.ExecuteQuery(Of Customer)("SELECT CustomerID, _ CompanyName, ContactName, ContactTitle, _ Address, City, Region, PostalCode, Country, Phone, Fax _ FROM dbo.Customers _ WHERE City = {0}", "London") For Each c As Customer In customers Console.WriteLine(c.ContactName) Next ```

summary.span: 获取由 跟踪的被修改对象。

span.span: Gets the modified objects tracked by .

returns.span: 该对象集返回为三个只读的集合。

span.span: The set of objects is returned as three read-only collections.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意以下事项：Note the following considerations: - 可能有副作用，如在时通常执行的插入和删除操作的推理 。 might have side effects, such as inference of insert and delete operations that are usually performed at the time of . 例如，在以下操作中使用的对象可以在下面的列表中创建相应的推断操作：For example, objects that are used in the following operations can create corresponding inferred operations in the following list: - 到 。 to . - 分配到 null (可能是由于的原因 。 assignment to null (possibly because of to . - 不能根据 foreign key 约束对集进行排序。The set may not be ordered according to foreign key constraints. - 数据库生成的值 (例如，主键和外键值、时间戳等) 不可用。Database-generated values (for example, primary and foreign key values, timestamps, and so forth) are not available. 此类信息需要执行数据库命令并可能传播检索到的信息 (例如，主键) 中的外键。Such information requires database command execution and perhaps the propagation of retrieved information (for example, foreign key from primary key). - 在调用时计算已更改对象的集合。The set of changed objects is computed at the time of the call. 如果进行了其他更改，对的后续调用可能会产生不同的集。Subsequent calls to can produce a different set if additional changes are made. 未进行任何更改时的输出如下所示：Output when no changes have been made appears as follows: `{Added: 0, Removed: 0, Modified: 0}` ## Examples [!code-csharp[DLinqDebuggingSupport#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DLinqDebuggingSupport/cs/Program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[DLinqDebuggingSupport#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DLinqDebuggingSupport/vb/Module1.vb#2)]

member this.GetCommand : System.Linq.IQueryable -> System.Data.Common.DbCommand

param.name: query
param.span: 要检索其 SQL 命令信息的查询。

span.span: The query whose SQL command information is to be retrieved.

summary.span: 获取有关由 [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] 生成的 SQL 命令的信息。

span.span: Gets the information about SQL commands generated by [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)].
The requested command information object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法只是 getter，不会影响 状态。This method is only a getter and does not affect state. 请注意以下事项：Note the following considerations: - 参数必须为非 null。The argument must be non-null. 否则，将引发 null 自变量异常。Otherwise, a null argument exception is thrown. - 查询执行过程中引发的正常查询转换异常 [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] 适用于无法转换的查询。Normal query translation exceptions thrown during [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] query execution apply for a query that cannot be translated. - 仅返回第一个查询命令。Only the first query command is returned. 具体而言，不包括用于预先加载 () 的其他命令 。Specifically, additional commands that are used for eager loading () are not included. - 不跟踪用户对命令执行的操作。 does not track what the user does with the command. 例如，不会跟踪执行返回命令的结果，也不会影响 状态。For example, results from the execution of the returned command are not tracked and do not affect state. ## Examples [!code-csharp[DLinqDebuggingSupport#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DLinqDebuggingSupport/cs/Program.cs#3)] [!code-vb[DLinqDebuggingSupport#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DLinqDebuggingSupport/vb/Module1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是的弱类型版本 。This is a weakly typed version of . 具有弱类型的版本非常重要，因为它是动态构造查询的一种相对常见的做法。It is important to have a weakly typed version because it is a relatively common practice to construct queries dynamically. 强制应用程序使用反射来调用正确的泛型方法是不方便的。It would be inconvenient to force the application to use reflection to call the correct generic method. 如果没有特定类型的集合，则会引发异常。If there is no collection for a particular type, an exception is thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是查询的主要入口点。This method is the main entry point for querying. 创建强类型时 ，新生成的属性将封装对此方法的调用。When a strongly typed is created, new generated properties encapsulate calls to this method. 例如，生成一个 `Customers` 返回的属性 `GetTable` 。For example, a `Customers` property is generated that returns `GetTable`. 如果没有特定类型的集合，则会引发异常。If there is no collection for a particular type, an exception is thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将此属性设置为 `false` 会在检索时提高性能，因为要跟踪的项目较少。Setting this property to `false` improves performance at retrieval time, because there are fewer items to track. 引发了异常：An exception is thrown: - 如果在执行查询后将属性设置为，则为 `false` 。If the property is set to `false` after a query has been executed. 有关详细信息，请参阅中的有效模式部分 。For more information, see the Valid Modes section in . - 如果属性设置为 `false` ， 则调用。If the property is set to `false` and is called. 如果 为 `false` ， 则将忽略，并将其视为 `false` 。If is `false`, is ignored and treated as `false`. 在这种情况下， 是只读的。In this case, the is read-only. 如果 为 `true` ， 则为 `false` 。If is `true`, is `false`. 在这种情况下， 允许使用指令加载对象图 ，但不启用延迟加载。In this case, allows you to load an object graph by using directives, but does not enable deferred loading.

summary.span: 使用数据库中的数据刷新对象的状态。

span.span: Refreshes object state by using data in the database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法在开放式并发错误之后用于使项进入状态以进行另一次尝试。This method is useful after an optimistic concurrency error to bring items into a state for another attempt. 它更新对象的基元字段和属性的状态。It updates the state of the primitive fields and properties on the objects. > [!NOTE] > 如果对象位于一对多关系的 *多* 一方，则将设置对象的外键，关系的另一侧的对象指针将设置为新值。If an object is on the *many* side of a one-to-many relationship, the foreign key on the object will be set and the object pointer for the other side of the relationship will be set to the new value.

summary.span: 计算要插入、更新或删除的已修改对象的集，并执行相应命令以实现对数据库的更改。

span.span: Computes the set of modified objects to be inserted, updated, or deleted, and executes the appropriate commands to implement the changes to the database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果存在用于插入、更新或删除的替代方法，则将 执行这些方法，而不是默认 [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] 命令。If override methods are present for insert, update, or delete, executes these methods instead of the default [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] commands. 启动事务，并在执行时发生异常时回滚 。 starts a transaction and will roll back if an exception occurs while is executing. 但是，这不会回滚内存中的更改，也不会对其进行跟踪 ; 这些更改将需要手动回滚。However, this does not roll back the changes in memory or tracked by the ; those changes will need to be rolled back manually. 如果要放弃内存中的更改，则可以从的新实例开始 。You can start with a new instance of the if the changes in memory are to be discarded.

summary.span: 获取或设置要用于访问数据库的 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的本地事务。

span.span: Gets or sets a local transaction for the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] to use to access the database.

value.span: 执行查询和命令时由 使用的事务对象。

span.span: The transaction object used by the when executing queries and commands.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的主要方案是与关系代码的互操作性 [!INCLUDE[vstecado](~/includes/vstecado-md.md)] 。The primary scenario for this property is interoperability with relational [!INCLUDE[vstecado](~/includes/vstecado-md.md)] code. 例如，当您编写自己的 `Create` / `Update` / `Delete` 方法以在 `Transaction` ADO 对象上设置属性 `Command` 时，请使用此属性。For example, use this property when you write your own `Create`/`Update`/`Delete` methods to set the `Transaction` property on the ADO `Command` object. 注意以下事项：Note the following: - 如果未显式设置此属性，则 getter 将返回 null。If this property has not been explicitly set, the getter returns null. - 如果代码在上下文中执行 ，则设置此属性将引发异常。If the code is executing in a context, setting this property throws an exception. - 如果设置了此属性并打开了新的 ，则执行查询或更新时将引发异常。If this property is set and a new is opened, an exception is thrown when a query or update is executed.

summary.span: 将现有 转换为对象。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的每一行 都将转换为中的对象 。Each row in the is converted to an object in the . ```csharp public IEnumerable Translate(IDataReader reader) {} ``` 说明：此方法用于将现有转换 为对象。Description: This method is used to convert an existing to objects. 中的每一行 都将转换为中的对象 。Each row in the is converted to an object in the . **泛型参数：****Generic parameters:** `T`：请参见 。`T`: See . **Parameters****Parameters:** `Query`：请参阅下有关命令的说明 。`Query`: See the description for command under . `Parameters`：请参阅下的参数说明 。`Parameters`: See the description for parameters under . **返回类型：****Return type:** ：由转换返回的对象的集合。: collection of objects returned by the conversion.
